gobblin.data.management.copy.converter

Class DistcpConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.converter.Converter<String,String,FileAwareInputStream,FileAwareInputStream>
      • gobblin.data.management.copy.converter.DistcpConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FinalState, Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DecryptConverter, UnGzipConverter

    public abstract class DistcpConverter
extends Converter<String,String,FileAwareInputStream,FileAwareInputStream>
    Abstract class for distcp Converter. Simply transforms the InputStream in the FileAwareInputStream, and possibly modifies extensions of the output file.

      • inputStreamTransformation

        public abstract Function<FSDataInputStream,FSDataInputStream> inputStreamTransformation()
        Returns:
        A Function that transforms the FSDataInputStream in the FileAwareInputStream.

      • extensionsToRemove

        public List<String> extensionsToRemove()
        Returns:
        A list of extensions that should be removed from the output file name, which will be applied in order. For example, if this method returns ["gz", "tar", "tgz"] then "file.tar.gz" becomes "file".

      • extensionsToAdd

        public List<String> extensionsToAdd()
        TODO: actually use this method and add the extensions.
        Returns:
        A list of extensions that should be added to the output file name, to be applied in order. For example, if this method returns ["tar", "gz"] then "file" becomes "file.tar.gz".
